name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Project Reminder - Organize personal life and manage work with reminders

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create personal reminders, for work and organize your daily life

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create reminders to help with your daily life!
Create daily reminders to shop, walk the dogs, complete personal and professional tasks, take care of the house, and more!
